<JD_START>
Job Title: Superintendent - Multi-Family

Location: Middleton, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Position Overview: We are looking for an experienced Construction Superintendent to manage and oversee construction projects from start to finish. The Superintendent will ensure that the project is completed in a timely and effective manner, while providing excellent customer service to all project participants.

Key Responsibilities

Coordinate activities of workers, subcontractors and vendors to ensure quality and safety standards are metReview contracts and confer with the project team to determine project requirements and material needsPlan and schedule project timelines and milestones using project management toolsManage consultants, subcontractors, and vendors to ensure quality and progress of the projectConduct site visits, document progress, and report back to the project teamEnsure compliance with all safety regulations and OSHA guidelinesProvide guidance to the project team throughout all phases of the construction processMonitor and adjust timelines to ensure that construction stays on track and within budget

Qualifications

5+ years of experience in construction or construction management5+ years of experience managing multi-family construction projectsOSHA 10 certification, OSHA 30 preferredHighly organized with excellent planning and problem-solving skillsStrong understanding of construction safety standardsFamiliarity with industry-standard software for project managementAbility to remain calm under pressure and work quickly and efficiently

Benefits

Competitive Salary based on experience: $90,000 - $130,000/yearBonus PotentialHealth InsurancePaid Time OffCareer Growth PotentialGreat Company Culture

Email Your Resume In Word To

Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:

Jake.Tilton@CyberCoders.com

Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : JT9-1793742 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***

Jake Tilton - Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

CyberCoders is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, genetic information, registered domestic partner status, marital status, status as a crime victim, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. CyberCoders will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable law. CyberCoders is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodation to individuals with physical and mental disabilities. If you need special assistance or an accommodation while seeking employment, please contact a member of our Human Resources team to make arrangements.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
